name: You are apt
description:
Description

You are apt - is an exciting game in which your task is to destroy various objects that fall from above, the difficulty is that if at least one object falls down, you will lose. But you have a shield that can only absorb 10 objects, thereby slightly helping you. All objects of different shapes and sizes, getting into some is much easier than others. Also for each destroyed object you get points, when you reach a certain number of points, you go to higher levels, where difficulty increases. And how accurate are you?

Features:

- Exciting gameplay

- Increasing difficulty level

- A variety of falling objects

- Pleasant music
